Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at HYATT house Dallas/Lincoln Park in Dallas (SMU - Park Cities), you'll be minutes from Northpark Center and close to Meadows Museum. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Museum of Biblical Art and George W Bush Presidential Library and Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 155 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and premium TV channels provides entertainment. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a spa tub, a 24-hour fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 3 mi.

Dining
Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held on select days. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Dallas? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 1000 square feet (93 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held on select days. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum of Biblical Art - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
George W Bush Presidential Library and Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

Highland Park Shopping Village - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Medical City Hospital - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Frontiers of Flight Museum - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
White Rock Lake Park - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Magnolia Theater - 6.5 km / 4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dallas, TX (DAL-Love Field) - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Dallas, TX (DFW-Dallas-Fort Worth Intl.) - 25.4 km / 15.8 mi

The preferred airport for HYATT house Dallas/Lincoln Park is Dallas, TX (DFW-Dallas-Fort Worth Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
